title: nambum anbarai
sahitya:
nambum anbaraik-kAttaruL ANDavan naLina malarppadam paNi manamE


anupallavi

  shambhu prapancam engum nirai prabhu tAi vayiTril piravA orE svayambhu


caraNam    mAlum ayanum engaL deivam enbAr vAnOr munivar engaL deivam enbAr
nAlu maraiyum engaL deivam enumE namadu deivamum shivan avanE enru
